topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Sample wr.json File for Installing the KVM + ESX Topology

body.p: The process for installing the KVM + ESX deployment requires several JSON files that will be used when deploying the HLM VM.
body.section:
<<<<<<< .merge_file_2GNM4L
The following represents a sample wr.json file in the <cloudname>/vars directory of the HLM VM. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment. =======
For bonded NIC environments, edit the file as follows: { "lag_interface": "Y", "lag_mode": 4, "interface_mtu": 1500, "interface_ports": [ "eth0, eth1" ], >>>>>>> .merge_file_b50qSL
Return to Installing the KVM + ESX Deployment.
Make sure the file contains the following lines for the TUL network. Remove any additional TUL entries, if present: "vswitch_type": "nuage_vrs", "tul_ip_start_address": "10.20.6.50", "tul_ip_end_address": "10.20.6.99", "region_name": "regionone",
The following represents a sample wr.json file. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment. { "product": { "version": 1 },
"property-groups": [ { "name": "wr-vars", "properties": { <<<<<<< .merge_file_2GNM4L "database_storage":, # The storage allotment for the OpenStack databases. As a reference point, a system with six hosts, 40 VMs and 120 tenant networks requires about 9 GiB. "backup_storage":, # The storage allotment for backup operations. To ensure enough space for at least one backup, this should be equal to or greater than the sum of "database storage" and "image storage" "image_storage":, # The size of the partition to use for nova instances (root and ephemeral storage for an instance accounted under this). So please specify the value (in GB) per your requirement "region_name": "", # Specify a custom name of the KVM region ======= "database_storage": 70, "backup_storage": 300, "shared_instance_storage": 250, "vswitch_type": "nuage_vrs", "tul_ip_start_address": "10.20.6.50", "tul_ip_end_address": "10.20.6.99", "region_name": "regionone", >>>>>>> .merge_file_b50qSL "logical_interface": [ { "lag_interface": "N", "lag_mode": 4, "interface_mtu": 1500, "interface_ports": [ "eth0" ], "network": [ { "ip_start_address": "10.20.5.50", "ip_end_address": "10.20.3.99", "name": "management" }, { "ip_start_address": "172.16.73.50", "ip_end_address": "172.16.73.99", "name": "blockstore" }, { "ip_start_address": "10.20.4.50", "ip_end_address": "10.20.4.99", "name": "api" } ] } ], "pxeboot_cidr": "10.20.2.0/24", "license_file_name": "license.lic" } } ] }
